app.name: Confero
app.backtoevents: Go back to the list of conferences.

custom.instructions: Please star people, papers, and sessions to build your custom program. If you star a person, all of their papers will be added; if you star a session, all of its papers will be added.

paper.gotodoi: Open paper's DOI page in a browser.
paper.star: Star the paper to show under custom event.
paper.award: This paper has recieved an award.

session.star: Star the session to show under custom event.

people.star: Star the person to show under custom event.

about.getapp: Confero can be accessed on the web at http://conferoapp.com, but is best experienced through mobile apps. These can be found for free at the following places:
about.feedback: If you have any suggestions or encounter any problems, please let us know so we can continue to improve the app.
about.builtby: Confero was built by Reid Holmes and Rylan Cottrell to make it easier for conference organizers to provide high quality mobile programs for academic conferences.
about.thankyou: Confero is actively maintained and can be easily extended to support additional conferences. Special thanks to Jason Weathersby and the Mozilla for their support with FireFox OS, and Laura Inozemtseva and Oleksii Kononenko their suggestions and feedback. Confero was inspired by the Windows Phone My Conference app developed by Chris Bird and Thomas Zimmermann.
